/>
X.iv.2.B.2.d
.
Handling Evidence or Information Connecting the Claimant With the Homicide
If there is evidence or information connecting the claimant with the homicide, then develop by field examination to obtain all the facts.
Important
:  Do not request copies of grand jury records under
any
circumstances, either by letter or field examination.
Reference
:  For more information on requesting field examinations, see
M21-1, Part X, Subpart v, 1.E
.
title: M21-1, Part X, Subpart iv, Chapter 2, Section B  - Considering Eligibility When Homicide Is Involved
citation: Part X, Subpart iv, Chapter 2, Section B
